inclusion.criterion: Less than the 50th percentile for length for the general female population
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Allergy to metacresol (a preservative in the GH liquid that is injected)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Contraindications for Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) (such as metal in the body)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Part of a Y chromosome in child's karyotype
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Parent/guardian is not willing for child to be randomized to be in the treatment group
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Parent/guardian is not willing for child to have some of her developmental testing digitally recorded for scoring
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 12 year old girl with Turner syndrome, short stature and delayed puberty. Treating with GH since 6 months ago.
